item.title: Imperial hosts Muslim Student Panel
item.author: Hafiza Irshad,Ismaeel Karmani,
item.description: What is MSP? Muslim Student Panel (MSP) is a campaign hosted by Imperial College Union in collaboration with 13 Islamic Societies across the UK. It was formed in order to support prospective university students in their decisions in pursuing higher education. Whilst there is an abundance of …

item.title: Union Award nominations and shortlist announced
item.author: Hafiza Irshad,
item.description: Imperial College Union this week announced their nominees and winners for the 2018 Union Awards. The 14 categories, including ‘Campaign of the Year’, ‘Event of the Year’, and Union Colours acknowledge the efforts Union volunteers go to in order to improve the student experience at Imperial. …

item.title: WOMENinSTEM@IC group launched to support women in science and engineering
item.author: Hafiza Irshad,
item.description: Earlier this week saw the launch of the WOMENinSTEM@IC group, which aims to address the gender imbalance in STEM. The group, part of the Women’s Engineering Society (WES), held their launch event on the evening of Monday 21st May, attracting many young scientists with an impressive line-up of …

item.title: Nominations open for Union summer elections
item.author: Hafiza Irshad,
item.description: Imperial College Union earlier this week opened its doors to nominations for its third set of elections this academic year. The elections are running to fill the many remaining positions across four categories: Liberation & Community Officers; Constituent Union Leaders; Academic & Wellbeing …
